title: TWO For ONE Special
body_text:
First I want everyone to grasp the fact that
ECD
has remained a constant in our lives for nearly 8 years.. And since that Labor Day Weekend in 2005, the game's most enduring rivalry has remained unfinished.
With our final events on the horizon, the ongoing series of battles between sisters
Valerie and Lauren
has to end
now
. They're deadlocked at 2-2-2, an uncanny conclusion - or lack there of. There's no way around it this time; it must see finality and at the 199th, it will.
The Story Behind This Story
Prior to that fateful September evening, let it be known that the initial idea behind the journey we call
ECD
began with the help of the Winston duo. I remember it well, too.
Fins restaurant was the place some odd months before the inaugural "DODGEBALL DAY 1". My mind, well, a race full of ideas and the ladies that sat across tried to keep pace. It was during this that I expressed great interest in the creation of a dodgeball league. We jotted some names thinking nothing of it.
Scroll to the 3rd of September at the coveted Ocean Road Park basketball courts and magically my paper dream became the ultimate reality. That night,
ECD
's family feud commenced with Valerie and Lauren sharing the spotlight. While the elder Winston captured the victory, the subsequent seven-plus years of competition never ceased.
One More Time
This is no ordinary encounter as two crucial stipulations have been added in an effort to settle this once and for all:
▬ They've competed in singles contests, 2-vs-2 matches, and even a 6-person war. This time, while a fitting one-on-one showdown,
Pick Your Poison
rules will be in effect for the selection of teams. For those unaware, V & L will choose each others' supporting squads.
▬ Additionally, I have designated one particular player to participate as a member of both teams. This pre-selected combatant will also cement their legacy as the unprecedented
15th Inductee of the ECDElite Hall of Fame
.
What's Left?
Your attendance is all that remains. Take advantage of these final productions; you never know what you have until it's gone.
DODGEBALL CXCIX is Saturday, June 29 at the Wall High School tennis courts. Start time is 5:30pm.
________________________________________
_____________________________
Valerie vs. Lauren I | 9.3.2005
Valerie vs. Lauren II | 9.3.2006
Valerie vs. Lauren III | 12.23.2006
Valerie vs. Lauren IV | 9.1.2007
Valerie vs. Lauren V | 9.11.2010
Valerie vs. Lauren VI | 8.13.2011
body_html:
First I want everyone to grasp the fact that ECD has remained a constant in our lives for nearly 8 years.. And since that Labor Day Weekend in 2005, the game's most enduring rivalry has remained unfinished.

With our final events on the horizon, the ongoing series of battles between sisters Valerie and Lauren has to end now. They're deadlocked at 2-2-2, an uncanny conclusion - or lack there of. There's no way around it this time; it must see finality and at the 199th, it will.

The Story Behind This Story
Prior to that fateful September evening, let it be known that the initial idea behind the journey we call ECD began with the help of the Winston duo. I remember it well, too.

Fins restaurant was the place some odd months before the inaugural "DODGEBALL DAY 1". My mind, well, a race full of ideas and the ladies that sat across tried to keep pace. It was during this that I expressed great interest in the creation of a dodgeball league. We jotted some names thinking nothing of it.

Scroll to the 3rd of September at the coveted Ocean Road Park basketball courts and magically my paper dream became the ultimate reality. That night, ECD's family feud commenced with Valerie and Lauren sharing the spotlight. While the elder Winston captured the victory, the subsequent seven-plus years of competition never ceased.

One More Time
This is no ordinary encounter as two crucial stipulations have been added in an effort to settle this once and for all:
▬ They've competed in singles contests, 2-vs-2 matches, and even a 6-person war. This time, while a fitting one-on-one showdown, Pick Your Poison rules will be in effect for the selection of teams. For those unaware, V & L will choose each others' supporting squads.
▬ Additionally, I have designated one particular player to participate as a member of both teams. This pre-selected combatant will also cement their legacy as the unprecedented 15th Inductee of the ECDElite Hall of Fame.

What's Left?
Your attendance is all that remains. Take advantage of these final productions; you never know what you have until it's gone.

DODGEBALL CXCIX is Saturday, June 29 at the Wall High School tennis courts. Start time is 5:30pm.
